attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Millions of ordinary hard working people are savers,the future of our savings are about to be made negative.We require the same protection as borrowers,cut the tax take on our savings

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
